title: unknown type name 'ssize_t' with gcc 4.8.5 on Linux
body_html:
when building the pytorch head (1bf717e) I get several errors like the following with gcc4.8.5 on Linux:

aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c: In function 'THMemoryFile_writeByte':
aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c:181:9: error: unknown type name 'ssize_t'
         ssize_t nByteWritten;                                           \
         ^

This can be fixed by adding

#include <sys/types.h>

to aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c

(I'm happy to provide a pull request if wanted)

body:
when building the pytorch head (1bf717e17) I get several errors like the following with gcc4.8.5 on Linux:

```
aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c: In function 'THMemoryFile_writeByte':
aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c:181:9: error: unknown type name 'ssize_t'
         ssize_t nByteWritten;                                           \
         ^
```

This can be fixed by adding 
```
#include <sys/types.h>
```

to `aten/src/TH/THMemoryFile.c`

(I'm happy to provide a pull request if wanted)
